The tag submit/tizen_ivi_stable/20131116.101541 was pushed, but it was not completed because of the following reason(s):

- The tag means you want to submit commit 97a39447c40761f7d3f71cde84388046bf19d36d in tizen_ivi_stable branch to OBS, but this commit does NOT exist in tizen_ivi_stable branch. Please use correct branch name as version in tag name submit/{version}/{date.time}.

Suggest to use "gbs submit" to trigger submission, or use following command to create tag "git tag submit/${version}/$(date --utc +%%Y%%m%%d.%%H%%M%%S) -m "****" ".
